title: Ignorance and error reproved being an answer to some queries that one John Reynolds wrote to two of the people called Quakers / by Thomas Taylor.
author: Taylor, Thomas, 1618-1682.
publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Also appears as part of his Truth's innocency and simplicity,  London, 1697.
